sentences.sContent: But even in this "concertinaed" timeline - extending millions of centuries into the future, as well as into the past - this century is special.
sentences.sContent_eng: But even in this "concertinaed" timeline - extending millions of centuries into the future, as well as into the past - this century is special.
sentences.sCn: 不过，即使在这张向未来、向过去延伸数百万世纪的“折叠式”时间表上，本世纪也是特别的一个世纪。
